long_description: The Petzl Tikka(R) XP Headlamp features a consistent output and multiple beam options for proximity and long-range lighting; plus, it has a 160-lumen boost mode to light up the darkest trails. High-output LED and standard LED combine to offer 5 brightness settings that range in output from 5 lumens to 160 lumens and throw light 8 - 70m. Boost setting gives you temprary access to 160 lumens to spot rappel anchors and light up dark sections of the trail. Red LED positioned to the side of the white LED helps preserve your night vision. Use the red and white strobes to signal for help in the mountains or increase your visibility in urban settings. 3 AAA alkaline batteries (included) provide up to 2 hrs. of use on high, 6 hrs. on medium and 100 hrs on low; compatible with rechargeable NiMH and lithium batteries. Constant Lighting technology ensures that the brightness doesn't decrease gradually as the batteries drain. When the batteries are almost drained, the headlamp automatically switches to reserve mode, which provides a minimum of 8 lumens for 40 hrs. Red lighting switches on when the batteries are practically empty to preserve a minimal amount of lighting. Push-button switch is easy to use, even with gloves on. Mixed fabric and elastic headband fits comfortably around your head; headband is washable. Petzl Tikka XP Headlamp battery case opens easily for changing the batteries. Provides IPX4 water resistance for protection against sprayed water.
short_description: The Petzl Tikka(R) XP Headlamp features a consistent output and multiple beam options for proximity and long-range lighting; plus, it has a 160-lumen boost mode to light up the darkest trails.
